channel.title: Add custom fonts to client
channel.description:
I'd like to know how to load a custom font in my client.
I'd be nice if you can load from cache but if not, it's ok.
OR
I'd like someone to point out to me what I can use to convert a .ttf to the .dat format Jagex uses in their cache.

item.title: Add custom fonts to client
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Fritz Owner Fritz
item.description:
@Owner_Fritz wrote:

I’d like to know how to load a custom font in my client.

I’d be nice if you can load from cache but if not, it’s ok.

OR

I’d like someone to point out to me what I can use to convert a .ttf to the .dat format Jagex uses in their cache.

Read full topic
